ARTICLE.TITLE: Editorial: Coronavirus and corruption: Two scourges Illinois needs to extinguish
ARTICLE.TEXT: This is why the role of federal prosecutors is critical. Citizens have tried to shake up their government on redistricting reform, on term limits, on ethics, only to be blocked time and again by the party in charge. Citizens have voted with their feet, leaving Illinois in an exodus fashion that is likely to cause the state to lose another Congressional seat. They are fed up.
